actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to exempt certain small employers.

summary.text: Redefines the term employer under the Occupational Health and Safety Act to mean a person engaged in business affecting commerce who has employees but does not include the U.S., any State or policial subdivision of a State, or any agricultural or nonagricultural employer who employed no more than 25 employees at any time during the preceding calendar year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to exempt certain small employers.
